page.title: 06VILLAGE LIFE
page.content: SSarah is a sixteen year old girl who lives in a family of three. Sarah has lived in the village of Wootton St. Lawrence for three and a half years. As there is no school in the village she went to Cranbourne but now she has left. She finds it boring in the village and she would prefer to live in the town because there is a lot more entertainment. There are very few children living in the village. In Sarah's spare time she likes to go bell ringing in the church.We asked Sarah if she wanted any changes in the village and she said she would like a swimming pool.
